rules_text:
[i]({T}: Add {R}.)[/i]
Lavastep Warrens enters tapped.
{2}{R}: Until end of turn, Lavastep Warrens becomes a 2/1 red Goblin Warrior creature with “Other creatures you control have haste” and “Whenever this creature attacks, other creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.” Its still a land. Activate only once each turn.”
